name: papillote
content:
en papillote
Add to word list
Add to word list
wrapped in special paper or in foil (= thin, shiny, metal material), and cooked: They serve French classics such as salmon en papillote.
See more
[ C ] a parcel of food wrapped and cooked in paper or foil, or the paper or foil itself: Put the onions in tinfoil with some oil and the thyme, and fold tightly to create a papillote. The sea bass is baked in a paper papillote. papillotes of sole in a lemon and pepper sauce
